lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson eagled his final hole at Poppy Hills for a seven-under-par 65 Thursday to share the lead with the rookie John Mallinger and Nick Watney at the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am.
snippet: Phil Mickelson eagled his final hole at Poppy Hills for a seven-under-par 65 Thursday to share the lead with the rookie John Mallinger and Nick Watney at the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am.
